Description: Coeur Alaska, Inc., will pay a $170,000 penalty to resolve Clean Water Act violations stemming from unpermitted discharges at the Kensington Gold Project, located 40 miles north of Juneau, Alaska.
Info Source: https://archive.epa.gov/epapages/newsroom_archive/newsreleases/8abd98ec5d926209852577fb00720f13.html

Agency: Environmental Protection Agency referral to the Justice Department
Info Source: https://www.epa.gov/newsreleases/epa-and-coeur-alaska-settle-over-alleged-kensington-mine-pollution-discharges
Contained in data received from the agency on November 5, 2020 in response to an open records request.
